text: The grilled cheese at Ferris is pretty solid. Kind of basic but reliable. The line is so long though.
Absolutely delicious grilled cheese! Melted to perfection with crispy edges.
The waffles are crispy and sweet, perfect for breakfast.
Fresh and flavorful salmon! A healthy and tasty option.
Spicy and delicious tacos. Quick service!
Honey chicken is the best! Sweet and crispy every time.
Classic cheeseburger with a juicy patty. Great for lunch.
Loved the cheesy goodness in the burger! Highly recommend.
Good portion size and fresh taste.
Perfectly cooked waffles with just the right amount of sweetness!
